description: Installation of one temporary classroom portacabin
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The modular building hereby permitted shall be removed and the land re-instated to its condition as hard surfing after practical completion of the East Wing (and as approved under 00859/A/P24) or by 31st December 2022, whichever is the sooner.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (FORT-PC-001PLAN 04 Classroom Portacabin 3D Representation, FORT-PC-001PLAN 02 Classroom Portacabin site plan, FORT-PC-001PLAN 02 Classroom Portacabin, D120, Planning, Design & Access Statement, Statement for Heritage Significance prepared by West Waddy ADP dated June 2010, FORT-PC-001 PLAN 05; received 28/01/2010) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
